Subject: Beast Wars

From: "Michael Stadnik" <mstadnik@...>

As Fracturcon speeds his way towards Dinobot's location he can't help but n=
otice that he recognizes this terrain somewhat.  He had never visited a pla=
net like Earth before, but he knew he must recognize the area from historic=
al accounts of transformer history.  "Computer, scan geographical area & cr=
oss reference with historical landmarks in transformer history."  Even befo=
re the computer responds to his request Fracturcon realizes that this is th=
e area where the Ark crash landed.  Before the computer confirms this Fract=
urcon instructs his computer at his base to scan for any transformer(s) in =
the area where the Ark is at.  After a few blips & bleeps the computer resp=
onds "Contact made with multiple targets in or around vicinity of the Ark. =
 What!!!", stammers Fracturcon, "if there are Predicons or maximals in the =
Ark then there is a potential of the timeline being distrubed.  Am I the on=
ly transformer who even gives a damn about preserving our fragile history? =
 Am I the only transformer who doesn't give a rats a** about power & politi=
cs?  When I get to the Ark these interloopers better clear out or I'm going=
 to make them a permanent part of history."  As Fracturcon burns his booste=
rs to the max towards the Ark, his thoughts are not towars finding the iden=
tity of who this Dinobot is, but of casting out the intruders in the Ark.  =
As he approaches the Ark the only thing he speaks is "Charge all weapons to=
 maximum....and prepare to engage targets....."
